'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
The Vailian Trench is a long, narrow stretch of deep ocean, separating the southwestern and southeastern sections of the Deadfire.
title: The Vailian Trench
